================================================================================
weird name
================================================================================

enum enum {}

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

parseTree = [
  {kind: BOF},
    {kind: enum},
    {kind: enum},
    {kind: {},
  {kind: }, subtreeSize: 4},
  {kind: EOF},
]

================================================================================
name
================================================================================

message Test {}

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

parseTree = [
  {kind: BOF},
    {kind: message},
    {kind: Identifier},
    {kind: {},
  {kind: }, subtreeSize: 4},
  {kind: EOF},
]

================================================================================
empty statement
================================================================================

enum Test { ; }

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

parseTree = [
  {kind: BOF},
    {kind: enum},
    {kind: Identifier},
    {kind: {},
  {kind: }, subtreeSize: 4},
  {kind: EOF},
]

================================================================================
option
================================================================================

enum Test { option deprecated = true; }

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

parseTree = [
  {kind: BOF},
    {kind: enum},
    {kind: Identifier},
    {kind: {},
      {kind: option},
        {kind: Identifier},
        {kind: true},
      {kind: =, subtreeSize: 3},
    {kind: ;, subtreeSize: 5},
  {kind: }, subtreeSize: 9},
  {kind: EOF},
]

================================================================================
options
================================================================================

enum Test { option deprecated = true; option test = true; }

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

parseTree = [
  {kind: BOF},
    {kind: enum},
    {kind: Identifier},
    {kind: {},
      {kind: option},
        {kind: Identifier},
        {kind: true},
      {kind: =, subtreeSize: 3},
    {kind: ;, subtreeSize: 5},
      {kind: option},
        {kind: Identifier},
        {kind: true},
      {kind: =, subtreeSize: 3},
    {kind: ;, subtreeSize: 5},
  {kind: }, subtreeSize: 14},
  {kind: EOF},
]

================================================================================
expected identifier
================================================================================

enum {}

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

parseTree = [
  {kind: BOF},
    {kind: enum},
    {kind: {, hasError: true},
  {kind: }, subtreeSize: 3},
  {kind: EOF},
]
errs = [expected [Identifier], got {]

================================================================================
expected right brace
================================================================================

enum Test {

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

parseTree = [
  {kind: BOF},
    {kind: enum},
    {kind: Identifier},
    {kind: {},
  {kind: EOF, hasError: true, subtreeSize: 4},
]
errs = [expected [}], got EOF]
